entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 6:18AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Storm May Push Water Up On The Ice... A strong winter storm moving through the Bering Strait may push water up on the ice. Strong south winds associated with the storm will push a surge of water under the ice, south of the Bering Strait, that may push up on top of the ice through open leads and fishing holes.
